nodes.text: Soler was a male Twi'lek living on Makeb during the Galactic War. During the Conquest of Makeb in 3638 BBY he was a councillor to Mayor Erkens of the Tarlam City. After being rescued from an Isotope-5 droid by a Galactic Republic agent, Soler and Erkens asked their rescuer to cover the Tarlam shuttle padds with energy shields to prevent the Hutts from landing reinforcements.
Councillor Soler appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion, released on April 9, 2013.
